verses.text: And \w Elisha|strong="H0477"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w one|strong="H0259"\w* of the \w children|strong="H1121"\w* of the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Gird \w up|strong="H2296"\w* thy \w loins|strong="H4975"\w*, and \w take|strong="H3947"\w* this \w box|strong="H6378"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* in thine \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*:

And when thou \w comest|strong="H0935"\w* thither, look \w out|strong="H7200"\w* there \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nimshi|strong="H5250"\w*, and go \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, and make him arise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* from \w among|strong="H8432"\w* his \w brethren|strong="H0251"\w*, and \w carry|strong="H0935"\w* him to an \w inner|strong="H2315"\w* \w chamber|strong="H2315"\w*;\f + \fr 9.2 \ft inner…: Heb. chamber in a chamber\f*

Then \w take|strong="H3947"\w* the \w box|strong="H6378"\w* of \w oil|strong="H8081"\w*, and \w pour|strong="H3332"\w* \add it\add* on his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I have \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*. Then \w open|strong="H6605"\w* the \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, and \w flee|strong="H5127"\w*, and \w tarry|strong="H2442"\w* not.
¶ So the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w*, \add even\add* the young \w man|strong="H5288"\w* the \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*.

And when he \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, behold, the \w captains|strong="H8269"\w* of the \w host|strong="H2428"\w* \add were\add* \w sitting|strong="H3427"\w*; and he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I have an \w errand|strong="H1697"\w* to thee, O \w captain|strong="H8269"\w*. And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Unto which of all us? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, To thee, O \w captain|strong="H8269"\w*.

And he \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, and \w went|strong="H0935"\w* into the \w house|strong="H1004"\w*; and he \w poured|strong="H3332"\w* the \w oil|strong="H8081"\w* on his \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, I have \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*, \add even\add* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

And thou shalt \w smite|strong="H5221"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* thy \w master|strong="H0113"\w*, that I may \w avenge|strong="H5358"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of my \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* the \w prophets|strong="H5030"\w*, and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of all the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, at the \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* of \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w*.

For the whole \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* shall \w perish|strong="H0006"\w*: and I will cut \w off|strong="H3772"\w* from \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* him that \w pisseth|strong="H8366"\w* against the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and him that is shut \w up|strong="H6113"\w* and \w left|strong="H5800"\w* in \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*:

And I will \w make|strong="H5414"\w* the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* like the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Jeroboam|strong="H3379"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nebat|strong="H5028"\w*, and like the \w house|strong="H1004"\w* of \w Baasha|strong="H1201"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahijah|strong="H0281"\w*:

And the \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* shall \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* in the \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, and \add there shall be\add* none to \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* \add her\add*. And he \w opened|strong="H6605"\w* the \w door|strong="H1817"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*.

¶ Then \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* came \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* to the \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* of his \w lord|strong="H0113"\w*: and \add one\add* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto him, \add Is\add* all \w well|strong="H7965"\w*? wherefore \w came|strong="H0935"\w* this \w mad|strong="H7696"\w* \add fellow\add* to thee? And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w* unto them, Ye \w know|strong="H3045"\w* the \w man|strong="H0376"\w*, and his \w communication|strong="H7879"\w*.

And they \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add It is\add* \w false|strong="H8267"\w*; \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* us now. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus and thus \w spake|strong="H0559"\w* he to me, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, I have \w anointed|strong="H4886"\w* thee \w king|strong="H4428"\w* over \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*.

Then they \w hasted|strong="H4116"\w*, and \w took|strong="H3947"\w* every \w man|strong="H0376"\w* his \w garment|strong="H0899"\w*, and \w put|strong="H7760"\w* \add it\add* under him on the \w top|strong="H1634"\w* of the \w stairs|strong="H4609"\w*, and \w blew|strong="H8628"\w* with \w trumpets|strong="H7782"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* is \w king|strong="H4427"\w*.\f + \fr 9.13 \ft is king: Heb. reigneth\f*

So \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nimshi|strong="H5250"\w* \w conspired|strong="H7194"\w* against \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*. (Now \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* had \w kept|strong="H8104"\w* \w Ramoth-gilead|strong="H7433"\w*, he and all \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w because|strong="H6440"\w* of \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*.

But \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* was \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* to be \w healed|strong="H7495"\w* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* of the \w wounds|strong="H4347"\w* which the \w Syrians|strong="H0761"\w* had \w given|strong="H5221"\w* him, when he \w fought|strong="H3898"\w* with \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Syria|strong="H0758"\w*.) And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, If it \w be|strong="H3426"\w* your \w minds|strong="H5315"\w*, \add then\add* let \w none|strong="H0408"\w* go \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \add nor\add* \w escape|strong="H6412"\w* out of the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* to \w go|strong="H3212"\w* to \w tell|strong="H5046"\w* \add it\add* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*.\f + \fr 9.15 \ft Joram: Heb. Jehoram but not in verse sixteen\f*\f + \fr 9.15 \ft had given: Heb. smote\f*\f + \fr 9.15 \ft let none…: Heb. let no escaper go, etc\f*

So \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* rode in a \w chariot|strong="H7392"\w*, and \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*; for \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* \w lay|strong="H7901"\w* there. And \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* was come \w down|strong="H3381"\w* to \w see|strong="H7200"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w*.

And there \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* a \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* on the \w tower|strong="H4026"\w* in \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, and he \w spied|strong="H7200"\w* the \w company|strong="H8229"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* as he \w came|strong="H0935"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, I \w see|strong="H7200"\w* a \w company|strong="H8229"\w*. And \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* an \w horseman|strong="H7395"\w*, and \w send|strong="H7971"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* them, and let him \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is it\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*?

So there \w went|strong="H3212"\w* one on \w horseback|strong="H7392"\w* to \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \add Is it\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*? And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, What hast thou to do with \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*? \w turn|strong="H5437"\w* thee \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* me. And the \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, The \w messenger|strong="H4397"\w* \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to them, but he cometh not \w again|strong="H7725"\w*.

Then he sent \w out|strong="H7971"\w* a \w second|strong="H8145"\w* on \w horseback|strong="H7392"\w*, which \w came|strong="H0935"\w* to them, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Thus \w saith|strong="H0559"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \add Is it\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*? And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, What hast thou to do with \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*? \w turn|strong="H5437"\w* thee \w behind|strong="H0310"\w* me.

And the \w watchman|strong="H6822"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, He \w came|strong="H0935"\w* even unto them, and cometh not \w again|strong="H7725"\w*: and the \w driving|strong="H4491"\w* \add is\add* like the \w driving|strong="H4491"\w* of \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Nimshi|strong="H5250"\w*; for he \w driveth|strong="H5090"\w* \w furiously|strong="H7697"\w*.\f + \fr 9.20 \ft driving: or, marching\f*\f + \fr 9.20 \ft furiously: Heb. in madness\f*

And \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Make \w ready|strong="H0631"\w*. And his \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w* was made \w ready|strong="H0631"\w*. And \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* and \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w*, \w each|strong="H0376"\w* in his \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*, and they went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w against|strong="H7125"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, and \w met|strong="H4672"\w* him in the \w portion|strong="H2513"\w* of \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* the \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*.\f + \fr 9.21 \ft Make ready: Heb. Bind\f*\f + \fr 9.21 \ft met: Heb. found\f*

And it came to pass, when \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*, that he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Is it\add* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w*? And he \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*, What \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, so long \w as|strong="H5704"\w* the \w whoredoms|strong="H2183"\w* of thy \w mother|strong="H0517"\w* \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* and her \w witchcrafts|strong="H3785"\w* \add are so\add* \w many|strong="H7227"\w*?

And \w Joram|strong="H3088"\w* \w turned|strong="H2015"\w* his \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w fled|strong="H5127"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w* to \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*, \add There is\add* \w treachery|strong="H4820"\w*, O \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w*.

And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* drew a \w bow|strong="H7198"\w* with his \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w strength|strong="H3027"\w*, and \w smote|strong="H5221"\w* \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* between his \w arms|strong="H2220"\w*, and the \w arrow|strong="H2678"\w* went \w out|strong="H3318"\w* at his \w heart|strong="H3820"\w*, and he sunk \w down|strong="H3766"\w* in his \w chariot|strong="H7393"\w*.\f + \fr 9.24 \ft drew…: Heb. filled his hand with a bow\f*\f + \fr 9.24 \ft sunk: Heb. bowed\f*

Then \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \add Jehu\add* to \w Bidkar|strong="H0920"\w* his \w captain|strong="H7991"\w*, Take \w up|strong="H5375"\w*, \add and\add* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* him in the \w portion|strong="H2513"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* of \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w* the \w Jezreelite|strong="H3158"\w*: for \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* how that, when I and thou \w rode|strong="H7392"\w* \w together|strong="H6776"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* his \w father|strong="H0001"\w*, the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* \w laid|strong="H5375"\w* this \w burden|strong="H4853"\w* upon him;

Surely I have \w seen|strong="H7200"\w* \w yesterday|strong="H0570"\w* the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of \w Naboth|strong="H5022"\w*, and the \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* of his \w sons|strong="H1121"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*; and I will \w requite|strong="H7999"\w* thee in this \w plat|strong="H2513"\w*, \w saith|strong="H5002"\w* the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*. Now therefore \w take|strong="H5375"\w* \add and\add* \w cast|strong="H7993"\w* him into the \w plat|strong="H2513"\w* \add of ground\add*, according to the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d*.  +  r 9.26  t blood: Heb. bloods *  +  r 9.26  t plat: or, portion *

¶ But when \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* the \w king|strong="H4428"\w* of \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w saw|strong="H7200"\w* \add this\add*, he \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* by the \w way|strong="H1870"\w* of the \w garden|strong="H1588"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*. And \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* \w followed|strong="H7291"\w* \w after|strong="H0310"\w* him, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Smite|strong="H5221"\w* him also in the \w chariot|strong="H4818"\w*. \add And they did so\add* at the going \w up|strong="H4608"\w* to \w Gur|strong="H1483"\w*, which \add is\add* by \w Ibleam|strong="H2991"\w*. And he \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* to \w Megiddo|strong="H4023"\w*, and \w died|strong="H4191"\w* there.

And his \w servants|strong="H5650"\w* \w carried|strong="H7392"\w* him in a chariot to \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w*, and \w buried|strong="H6912"\w* him in his \w sepulchre|strong="H6900"\w* with his \w fathers|strong="H0001"\w* in the \w city|strong="H5892"\w* of \w David|strong="H1732"\w*.

And in the \w eleventh|strong="H0259"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* of \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* the \w son|strong="H1121"\w* of \w Ahab|strong="H0256"\w* began \w Ahaziah|strong="H0274"\w* to \w reign|strong="H4427"\w* over \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*.

¶ And when \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* was \w come|strong="H0935"\w* to \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*, \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* \add of it;\add* and she \w painted|strong="H7760"\w* her \w face|strong="H5869"\w*, and \w tired|strong="H3190"\w* her \w head|strong="H7218"\w*, and looked \w out|strong="H8259"\w* at a \w window|strong="H2474"\w*.\f + \fr 9.30 \ft painted…: Heb. put her eyes in painting\f*

And as \w Jehu|strong="H3058"\w* entered \w in|strong="H0935"\w* at the \w gate|strong="H8179"\w*, she \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \add Had\add* \w Zimri|strong="H2174"\w* \w peace|strong="H7965"\w*, who \w slew|strong="H2026"\w* his \w master|strong="H0113"\w*?

And he lifted \w up|strong="H5375"\w* his \w face|strong="H6440"\w* to the \w window|strong="H2474"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Who \add is\add* on my side? who? And there looked \w out|strong="H8259"\w* to him \w two|strong="H8147"\w* \add or\add* \w three|strong="H7969"\w* \w eunuchs|strong="H5631"\w*.\f + \fr 9.32 \ft eunuchs: or, chamberlains\f*

And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, Throw her \w down|strong="H8058"\w*. So they threw her \w down|strong="H8058"\w*: and \add some\add* of her \w blood|strong="H1818"\w* was \w sprinkled|strong="H5137"\w* on the \w wall|strong="H7023"\w*, and on the \w horses|strong="H5483"\w*: and he trode her under \w foot|strong="H7429"\w*.

And when he was come \w in|strong="H0935"\w*, he did \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* and \w drink|strong="H8354"\w*, and \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, \w Go|strong="H6485"\w*, see now this \w cursed|strong="H0779"\w* \add woman\add*, and \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* her: for she \add is\add* a \w king’s|strong="H4428"\w* \w daughter|strong="H1323"\w*.

And they \w went|strong="H3212"\w* to \w bury|strong="H6912"\w* her: but they \w found|strong="H4672"\w* no more of her \w than|strong="H0518"\w* the \w skull|strong="H1538"\w*, and the \w feet|strong="H7272"\w*, and the \w palms|strong="H3709"\w* of \add her\add* \w hands|strong="H3027"\w*.

Wherefore they came \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, and \w told|strong="H5046"\w* him. And he \w said|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* the \w word|strong="H1697"\w* of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, which he \w spake|strong="H1696"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* his \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w Elijah|strong="H0452"\w* the \w Tishbite|strong="H8664"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*, In the \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w* shall \w dogs|strong="H3611"\w* \w eat|strong="H0398"\w* the \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* of \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w*:\f + \fr 9.36 \ft by: Heb. by the hand of\f*

And the \w carcase|strong="H5038"\w* of \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w* shall be as \w dung|strong="H1828"\w* upon the \w face|strong="H6440"\w* of the \w field|strong="H7704"\w* in the \w portion|strong="H2506"\w* of \w Jezreel|strong="H3157"\w*; \add so\add* that they shall not \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, This \add is\add* \w Jezebel|strong="H0348"\w*.
